coded_answer.p: Thank you very much for this occasionopportunity. I'd like to travel only in July, because, infor the rest of the year, I'm working in a bank. The second reason is the weather. I love travelling when the weather is warm. AboutRegarding the accommodation, I'd prefer to stay in a log cabinslog cabin, because for me and my family'sfamily it is more comfortableit is more comfortable for me and my family. I have a baby and three dogs, so it should be better in a log cabinslog cabin.
I'd like spend all of my time in a swimming-poolswimming pool because I love swimming. I like alsoalso like surfing, because I love the wind in themy hair and the fresh on my body.
OnlyI have only one question about athe baby's accomodationaccommodation. May I have a babysitter? I'd like to have more free time for myself and my health.
I've never been there, so it will be a pleasure for me.
Let me say stillagain thank youthank you again.
I'm looking forward to metingmeeting you
How are you? I'm fine. I'm sorry I didn't write to you before, but I was so busy with my exams.

First of all, I want to tell you what happened last month. Do you remember which is my favourite group? So, Youyou don'twon't believe me, but I enjoedenjoyed helping at aan Oasis'sOasis pop concert. IIt was a great and wonderful experience. The group needsneeded to foundfind a good microphone for the concert, because the singer lost his microphone last concert. Me and my friend were there to hear the sound-check, and when I understood what was happinghappening on the stage, I decided to help them. Of course you know, I'm a singer, so I came back quigkyquickly to my home, I picked up my microphone, and I handed it to the singer.

The concert was absolutely fantastic. I was so glad, because inat the endingend of the show the singer kissed me and dedicated to me a lovely songa lovely song to me. Can you immagineimagine? OkOK, write to me soon, huge hug and kisses
